titles.title: Tanning Tax Repeal Act of 2014
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on indoor tanning services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/10/2014--Introduced. Tanning Tax Repeal Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the 10% excise tax on indoor tanning services.
